dialogs.responseText: Hi. The name's Churbbles, but most folks call me the Sign Man on account of the weird name. Do you want me to make you a sign? 'Cuz I can, yessir, just bring me the materials.

dialogs.buttonText: Can you help me make a sign?
dialogs.responseText: I sure can! I love making signs, just bring me the materials and I'll be happy to help you.

dialogs.buttonText: What do you need to make a sign?
dialogs.responseText: I'll need a few things. First; It'll take three logs, white pine is best for seeing what's written on it. And I'll need some berries to make an ink for writing the words for the sign. I usually source my berries from the woods below the village.

dialogs.buttonText: I've got the things to make a sign.
dialogs.responseText: Great! Here you are, one "No Suliciters" sign. Sorry 'bout the spelling, never learned how.
